meanings.definition: Utter inarticulate sounds, as of pain or grief.
meanings.sent1: The baby cries when it is hungry.
meanings.sent2: She cries for help when she is scared.
meanings.sent3: The puppy cries for attention by barking loudly.
meanings.sent4: The wind cries through the trees on stormy nights.
meanings.sent5: The violin cries a melancholy tune in the sad movie scene.

meanings.sent1: The coach cries instructions to the players during the game.
meanings.sent2: He cries out in excitement when he wins the race.
meanings.sent3: The parrot cries out random words in the middle of the night.
meanings.sent4: The thunder cries its warning before the storm arrives.
meanings.sent5: The singer cries out the high notes with passion in the concert.
